SEARCH
Package hac.javareact

Class ApiServlet

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.GenericServlet
javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
hac.javareact.ApiServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
@WebServlet(name="ApiServlet", value="/api/highscores") public class ApiServlet extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
servlet to handle the highscores API. uses a file to store the highscores. the file contains a list of Record objects. the API handles GET and POST requests and updates the highscores file.
See Also:

    • getRecords

      private List<Record> getRecords() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      read the records from the file.
      Returns:
      the records from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be read.
      ClassNotFoundException - if the file contains an object that is not a Record.

    • writeRecord

      private void writeRecord(Record record, List<Record> records) throws DuplicateValueException, IOException
      write a record to the file. if the file does not exist, it will be created. if the file already contains a record with the same name, an exception will be thrown.
      Parameters:
      record - the record to write to the file.
      records - the records that are already in the file.
      Throws:
      DuplicateValueException - if the file already contains a record with the same name.
      IOException - if the file cannot be written.
